parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return whether a group's leader can issue attack commands to soldiers under his command.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Boolean]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''attackEnabled''' name

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> name: [[Object]] or [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>if (not '''attackEnabled''' _soldier) then {_soldier [[setCombatMode]] "Careless"} </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[enableAttack]]
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
